page.title: 12GAINFORD'S CUB PACK
page.content: { {Being a Cub.}The cub leader is called {Akeala}and he runs the pack. In cubs there are groups called green six, red six, and yellow six. The{sixes}have different coloured woggles to represent the colour of their six. Every year there is a{job week}when cubs and scouts go and earn money for tents and other equipment, by doing errands and jobs about the house. There is a camp every year where they play games, go hiking, sing songs and make camp fires.{The cub uniform}is a green jumper, grey shorts or trousers, a neckerchief and woggle. You can earn badges for running, swimming and other set tasks. Most boys enjoy going to cubs and look forward to going up to the{scout pack.
